review: I love this to stream content on my local PC to my TV with Plex. Don't use the apps to much as I already have a smart tv so for me the big feature was the streaming and it does that amazingly.
author: J. Shoemaker

review: This little device lives up to the hype. Streams Netflix and YouTube flawlessly. Super simple set up. The added support of Plex and Hulu Plus make this really a great value. Only draw back so far: had Chromecast for about 3 months, and in that time, I've had to re-configure the device twice to work on my network even though I've never changed the setup or its physical location. Hope this doesn't keep happening. Minor bug I suppose. Perhaps will get (or has been) fixed with the automatic updates. Love this gadget!
author: Randy C

review: Amazingly simple device it just works perfectly for what it is designed to do get video from almost every device to your television.
author: David

review: Shipped and received it fast, it worked immediately, didn't require too much setup and is compatible with macs, pc's, android phones and tablets as well as iPhones and iPads.Not much to say other than its artery fantastic little device especially at the given price. I can't wait until development really gets going so its full potential can be explored.

review: I have a roku, and apple tv (one was a gift)...so i'm experienced w/ a few different yet similar devices.  The thing i love about the Chromecast...it streams anything you can play on your chrome browser.  For me...i have showtime anytime...unfortunately neither my roku, apple tv or ps4 have an app.  That's where this bad boy comes handy...i can now stream showtime anytime straight to my TV.  Same for those shows on Hulu that you cant use the streaming app for...they also work.  Quality it good and its super simple to set up.  For $30...this thing is amazing.  I'm buying a couple to give as gifts.
